name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】『Connect Addict』✨3rd Anniversary Live【#獅白ぼたん3周年】 [dsH4DXtSpqk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Shishiro Botan introduces the concept of her 3rd Anniversary Live, 'Connect Addict'.
Song performance: Shishiro Botan and Kazama Iroha perform 'unfinished'.

subtitles.original: 今日はですね、ちょっと、まあ、遅れてしまったんですが、
subtitles.english: Today, well, I'm a bit... well, late, but

subtitles.original: 周年記念、ま、3周年目終わりまして、
subtitles.english: my anniversary, well, the 3rd anniversary has ended,

subtitles.original: 4周年目に突入するのかな？
subtitles.english: and I'm entering my 4th year, I guess?

subtitles.original: ということで、記念ライブを行わせていただこうかなと思います。
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to perform this anniversary live.

subtitles.original: 今回のね、ちょっとコンセプトがあって、
subtitles.english: I have a bit of a concept this time,

subtitles.original: えー、ホロメンに歌ってもらいたい歌とか、
subtitles.english: umm, songs I want Hololive members to sing,

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌いたいなと思った歌をゲストさんいっぱい呼んで、
subtitles.english: and songs I wanted to sing together, calling many guests,

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、披露していきたいなと思いますので、
subtitles.english: I'd like to perform them for you,

subtitles.original: ちょっと最後までたっぷり、いっぱいあるんで曲、
subtitles.english: so, please stay until the end, as there are lots of songs,

subtitles.original: よかったら見ていってください。
subtitles.english: and I hope you enjoy watching.

subtitles.original: ということで、もう早速いっぱいあるんで、いきましょう！
subtitles.english: So, since there are many, let's get started right away!

subtitles.original: しゅぴーん！
subtitles.english: Shu-peen!

subtitles.original: いつか君が示す場所へ
subtitles.english: Someday, to the place you point to,

subtitles.original: 祈る声が木霊し続ける
subtitles.english: my praying voice will continue to echo.

subtitles.original: 痛みこらえ進む意味を
subtitles.english: The meaning of moving forward while enduring pain,

subtitles.original: 探す　今、加速してく
subtitles.english: I'm searching for it. Now, it's accelerating.

subtitles.original:
―unfinished―
作詞：KOTOKO 作曲：八木沼悟志 編曲：八木沼悟志
subtitles.english:
—unfinished—
Lyrics: KOTOKO Composition: Satoshi Yaginuma Arrangement: Satoshi Yaginuma

subtitles.original: きらめが溢れた
subtitles.english: A flash of light overflowed

subtitles.original: 煩濁　停滞の世界
subtitles.english: in this world of chaos and stagnation.

subtitles.original: 行く体　辿ろ
subtitles.english: Following my moving body,

subtitles.original: 我の声も忘れてた
subtitles.english: I had even forgotten my own voice.

subtitles.original: 絆を紡ぐ風に
subtitles.english: In the wind that weaves bonds,

subtitles.original: 揺るがぬ自信探して
subtitles.english: searching for unwavering confidence.

subtitles.original: モノクロの朝が
subtitles.english: A monochrome morning

subtitles.original: 不意に輝き始めた
subtitles.english: suddenly began to shine.

subtitles.original: 変わらずにいてと願う事
subtitles.english: Wishing for things to stay the same,

subtitles.original: 変わりゆく時に生きる僕ら
subtitles.english: we live in a time of change.

subtitles.original: 本当の声を言えぬ夢を
subtitles.english: A dream where true voices can't be spoken,

subtitles.original: 君と繋がった空へ響かせて
subtitles.english: make it ring through the sky I'm connected to with you.

subtitles.original: もっと強くこの両手で
subtitles.english: Stronger, with these two hands,

subtitles.original: 涙すべて振り払えたら
subtitles.english: if I could brush away all my tears...

subtitles.original: 今度こそは呟く「今」と
subtitles.english: This time for sure, I'll mutter "now",

subtitles.original: 傷さえも無駄にしない
subtitles.english: and I won't let even my wounds go to waste.

subtitles.original: いつか君が示す場所へ
subtitles.english: Someday, to the place you point to,

subtitles.original: 薄い羽が焼かれようとも
subtitles.english: even if my thin wings are burned.

subtitles.original: 胸の奥で口を開く
subtitles.english: Opening its mouth deep within my chest,

subtitles.original: 真実へと加速してく
subtitles.english: accelerating towards the truth.

subtitles.original: 闇を見つめるの
subtitles.english: I'm gazing into the darkness

subtitles.original: 虚空に据えた瞳
subtitles.english: with eyes fixed on the void.

subtitles.original: 触れ合った肩が
subtitles.english: Our shoulders touched,

subtitles.original: わずか震えた気がした
subtitles.english: and I felt a slight tremor.

subtitles.original: 弱気で消えそうだけど
subtitles.english: I'm timid and feel like I might disappear,

subtitles.original: 守りたいもの確かにあるんだ
subtitles.english: but there's definitely something I want to protect.

subtitles.original: 絶望の窓　不安定な空の中
subtitles.english: Through the window of despair, in the unstable sky,

subtitles.original: 信じられるものはただひとつ
subtitles.english: the only thing I can believe in is just one.

subtitles.original: もっと深く感じさせて
subtitles.english: Let me feel it more deeply,

subtitles.original: 動き出した心と心
subtitles.english: the hearts that have started to move.

subtitles.original: 自分の目でそして触れて
subtitles.english: With my own eyes, and by touching,

subtitles.original: 感覚を手に入れたい
subtitles.english: I want to gain that sensation.

subtitles.original: 何を求め何を許し
subtitles.english: What to seek, what to forgive,

subtitles.original: いくつ抱え進めばいいの？
subtitles.english: how many things should I carry as I move forward?

subtitles.original: 目覚めかけた可能性を
subtitles.english: The possibility that's beginning to awaken,

subtitles.original: 手繰り寄せ加速してく
subtitles.english: I'll pull it close and accelerate.

subtitles.original: 僕のために泣いてくれた
subtitles.english: You cried for me.

subtitles.original: その瞳を笑わせたくて
subtitles.english: I want to make those eyes smile.

subtitles.original: もっと近くもっと深く
subtitles.english: Closer, deeper,

subtitles.original: 熱を帯び進化してく
subtitles.english: taking on heat and evolving.

subtitles.original: もっと強くこの両手で
subtitles.english: Stronger, with these two hands,

subtitles.original: 涙すべて振り払えたら
subtitles.english: if I could brush away all my tears...

subtitles.original: 今度こそは呟く「今」と
subtitles.english: This time for sure, I'll mutter "now",

subtitles.original: 傷さえも無駄にしない
subtitles.english: and I won't let even my wounds go to waste.

subtitles.original: もっと早く君のもとへ
subtitles.english: Faster, to where you are,

subtitles.original: たとえ羽がちぎれようとも
subtitles.english: even if my wings are torn apart.

subtitles.original: 歪む世界走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the distorted world,

subtitles.original: 感覚のその向こうへ
subtitles.english: to the beyond of sensation.

subtitles.original: 真実へと加速してく
subtitles.english: Accelerating towards the truth.
